name: Open Banking Aggregation API
description: API service that aggregates account information and payment initiation capabilities from multiple financial institutions through open banking standards

nodes.name: End User
nodes.description: Customer or application user who accesses their financial account information and initiates payments through the open banking aggregation service

nodes.name: Open Banking Aggregation System
nodes.description: Complete system providing open banking aggregation capabilities, including the API service and secure credential storage for multi-bank integration

nodes.name: Open Banking Aggregation Service
nodes.description: RESTful API service that provides unified access to multiple banks' open banking APIs, handling account information requests, payment initiation, and consent management across different financial institutions

nodes.name: Open Banking Credentials Database
nodes.description: Secure database storing authentication credentials and access tokens for downstream open banking API integrations with multiple financial institutions
